greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Convolution triangle, A053121 * (A001405 * 0^(n-k))
formula: A053121 = the aerated Catalan triangle and (A001405 * 0^(n-k) = an
infinite lower triangular matrix with A001405 as the main diagonal and
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: Row 4 = (2, 0, 6, 0, 6) = termwise products of (2, 0, 3, 0, 1) and (1, 1, 2, 3, 6).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 28 2008
